items.sentence: Some of my friends think Boston isn\'t a safe place to live.
Tom doesn\'t have to talk about that if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom smuggled a bottle of whiskey into Mary\'s hospital room.
Tom would never have let us go if Mary hadn\'t gone with us.
Tom said that he didn\'t know Mary was able to speak French.
Tom was going to go hang gliding, but then he chickened out.
Tom was supposed to hand in his homework before the weekend.
Tom told Mary that he couldn\'t do what she asked him to do.
Please don\'t forget to put out the fire before you go home.
Tom asked Mary if she would be willing to donate some money.
